mapper.select: select id, sid, rid, creat_at from bzfx.jc_special_ry where id = #{id}
select id, sid, rid, creat_at from bzfx.jc_special_ry limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into bzfx.jc_special_ry(sid, rid, creat_at) values (#{sid}, #{rid}, #{creatAt})
mapper.update:
update bzfx.jc_special_ry
sid = #{sid},
rid = #{rid},
creat_at = #{creatAt},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select ${field}, count(1) c from bzfx.jc_special_ry group by ${field}
